scripts.copy-dependencies: npm run copy-dompurify && npm run copy-marked && npm run copy-tailwindcss && npm run copy-pdfjs
scripts.copy-dompurify: npm run copy-dependency -- --name dompurify --dest-root aichatweb --src-root dist --files purify.es.mjs
scripts.copy-marked: npm run copy-dependency -- --name marked --dest-root aichatweb --src-root lib --files marked.esm.js
scripts.copy-tailwindcss: npm run copy-dependency -- --name tailwindcss --dest-root aichatweb --files preflight.css
